byline.original: By ADAM NAGOURNEY and IAN LOVETT

abstract: California Gov Jerry Brown signs legislation that will regulate sales of ammunition and impose new restrictions on high-capacity magazines for assault weapons; gun-rights advocates say Brown and legislators are exploiting mass shooting in San Bernardino, Calif, and Orlando, Fla, to impose 'draconian' laws on law-abiding citizens.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Jerry Brown signed six measures as part of an effort to curb gun violence. The new laws put new restrictions on assault weapons and regulate ammunition sales.

headline.main: California Governor Signs Legislation Limiting Assault Weapons
headline.print_headline: California Governor Enacts New Gun Limits in Wake of Shootings

snippet: Gov. Jerry Brown signed six measures as part of an effort to curb gun violence. The new laws put new restrictions on assault weapons and regulate ammunition sales....
